wikipedia_page.main: Kari Boto (née Blackburn) (30 March 1954 – 27 June 2007) was a BBC reporter and senior executive who specialised in Africa.

response: * Kari Blackburn – BBC World Service executive
*Kari Blackburn (born 1954), BBC World Service executive, drowned (suicide) at sea at Felixstowe, Suffolk, England in 2007.
*Kari Blackburn, 53, British broadcaster, suicide by drowning.
